name: Murder Man
description:
"I will cure him, because that's my job. Then a judge will hang him, because that's his..."

A satirical game in which the player controls not a steroid-fuelled mountain of muscle and weaponry, but rather a voluptuous Doctor trying to save all the poor, innocent Zombies who've been mown down by "Murder Man": the aforementioned mountain of muscle and weaponry...

The game was made back in 2009-2010 using Game Maker 7.
